name: onTop local
tagline: Innovative Solutions to Improve Your Business
description:
onTop local provides unique tools to simplify online marketing so small business owners can focus on building their business and can put their marketing on autopilot.
The company was started by Ron Howard and Troy Howard who were former executives at one of the largest marketing companies in the United States. Â They realized the problems of corporate marketing services in that the costs were too high for most individuals seeking to start their first business.
